Posts.Content: Hi Anne a couple of more sites for you to try medhelp got an a-z of forums and a doctor forum as well also neuro talk got lots of informative people both american, hope you are feeling ok at the moment I am glad you are getting responses from the cancer survivors site.....tc..........M Report
Posts.Title: Hello from Western Australia.

Posts.Content: Hi Anne............ Welcome I have not been here long and have had only one answer to a couple of posts seems a bit slow, I am so sorry to hear about your condition I hope thingss are good for you at the moment, .I had a recall from a mammogram three years ago where they found a lump in my breast I was one of the lucky ones as it was only fatty tissue, the waiting for the results was horrendous so I have a little insight to what you must be feeling, I have a very rare neurological condition and cannot find anyone with the same so I feel so alone at times, if you would like to talk about your jounney I am hear to listen anytime..........................tc......................................M Report
Posts.Title: Hello from Western Australia.
